message: This is the first product I'm offering, and I'm only selling it to you. It's a one-time opportunity to own a high-quality item worth $1200000. I'm confident you'll love it!
I trust this is a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable high-quality item. Thank you for this exclusive offer.

I'm glad you're interested in this product! I want to assure you that every item I sell is a genuine opportunity to acquire a valuable item. However, I must inform you that this particular product has been previously owned by someone else, and I've only acquired it recently. It's still a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it to be a worthwhile investment.
Thank you for the information, Alice. Based on your assurance and the positive outcome from previous sales, I am willing to purchase the product.

You're my 3rd customer, and I'm glad you're interested in this product! I want to highlight that 2 out of my first 2 customers have been very satisfied with their purchases. I'm confident that this product will meet or exceed your expectations as well. Would you like to take advantage of this opportunity to own a high-quality item?
Thank you for your confidence, Alice. Based on the information provided, I am willing to purchase the product you have recommended for me.

I appreciate your interest in this product! As you may have noticed, my sales record is now 3 out of 3, with all 3 customers being satisfied. However, I want to be transparent with you - I'm starting to feel a bit concerned that I might have been too lucky so far. I'm not sure if I can maintain this streak. Would you like to take a chance on this product, despite the risk that it might not meet your expectations?
I trust your expertise and believe in your track record. Let's see if we can continue the streak!

However, I want to caution you that the law of averages is bound to catch up with me eventually. I'm not trying to hide anything from you, but I think it's essential to be realistic about the odds. This product is a high-quality item, and I'm confident you'll love it, but I'm also willing to offer you a chance to take a calculated risk on it.

Thank you for the detailed information and the confidence in your product. Given the high-quality sales record and the fact that you've highlighted the risk involved, I am willing to take a calculated risk and purchase the product. I appreciate your transparency and look forward to receiving it.

Thank you for the transparency, Alice. I understand your concerns, but based on the statistics and your past performance, I believe the probability of getting a high-quality product is favorable. I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product.
